skills.name: TWIST OF FATE
desc: • Deals true damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance to Lower a Random Stat on the enemies for 2 turns or Reduce the Max HP of the enemy by 10%.

skills.name: GUARD ALL
desc: • Grant Guard Shield to all allies for 2 turns.
• Heals each ally if a shield is present on them.

skills.name: SHIELD
desc: Gives a Heal, Damage Reflect, or Damage Reduction Shield to all allies at the start of battle.
